Package com.project.couponProject3.controllers

Class AdminController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.project.couponProject3.controllers.ClientController
      • com.project.couponProject3.controllers.AdminController
  • @RestController
@RequestMapping("admin")
@CrossOrigin(origins="http://localhost:3000",
             allowedHeaders="*")
public class AdminController
extends ClientController
    Class of admin controller for REST commands

      • addCompany

        @PostMapping("add/company")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> addCompany​(@RequestHeader(name="Authorization")
                                                             java.lang.String token,
                                                             @RequestBody
                                                             Company company)
                                                      throws CompanyException,
                                                             io.jsonwebtoken.MalformedJwtException
        Method of REST command, using post mapping for adding new company to the system. Endpoint is: add/company Receives and returns the data in JSON data structure.
        Parameters:
        token - for authorization
        company - the company instance to add
        Returns:
        new token and an indication message of company created
        Throws:
        CompanyException - if data is incorrect
        io.jsonwebtoken.MalformedJwtException - if token is invalid
